transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Anil sir.
Customer: Anil madam.
Executive: Sir main Yashika bol rahi hoon abhi baat hui thi na aapse.
Customer: Madam ha baat hui thi actually wo staff na mera staff kal hi chala gaya tha main bahar tha.
Customer: Wo naya rakha tha sir usko samajh nahi aaya kya tha mujhe pata nahi chala.
Customer: Wo sir chod gaye the madam to abhi na Anil ji aapko phone karenge jo pehle se coordinate kar rahe hain.
Executive: Ha to sir aap Anil Dubey hain ya fir Anil Kumar hain.
Customer: Nahi main Anil Dubey hoon.
Executive: Achcha okay sir actually main bahut confused ho gayi hoon abhi subah sir ki call aayi thi to aap mujhe ek bar bataiye mujhe Anil sir ka number kaun sa matlab jo aapke Anil Kumar hai unka number kaun sa hai.
Customer: Ji ek minute ruk jao.
Customer: Madam jo serious hoke baat kar rahe hain na wo Anil Kumar hain aur jo hum hamesha hansi mazak karta rahe wo Anil Dubey hain.
Executive: Okay aur sir jo ye 98 wala number hai wo kiska number hai.
Customer: Mera number hai.
Executive: Okay theek hai so abhi isko train nahi karna hai 74 kuch karna ha bata dijiye.
Customer: 7428 ha 4210 theek hai 18 18 ye Anil Kumar ka number hai.
Customer: Anil Kumar ji ka number hai.
Executive: Theek hai to ab inko hi sab cheeze batani matlab sari cheeze jo mujhe pass karni hai.
Customer: Ha ji ha ji ha ji ha ji ha ji.
Executive: Theek hai main kar lungi to ab mujhe ek baat bata dijiye bas ki aapka jo bhi matlab feedback tha ki usko train karna hai to wo to main close kar do na sir kyuki abhi unko nahi karna abhi main Anil se.
Customer: Ha ha Anil Anil theek hai to aapke pass uska mail aayega to aap kar dijiyega please.
Customer: Ha main kar dunga kal to aapki chutti hai na.
Executive: Ha sir kal bhi chutti hai parso bhi chutti hai sir.
Customer: Kya baat hai do din ki chutti.
Executive: Yes sir theek hai join karna padega India.
Executive: Ab waise hamara matlab ki ek one ka bhi off hai kal ka matlab off nahi hai but main available nahi hoon office.
Customer: Nahi nahi main to waise hi generally puch raha hoon hafte mein do din ki chutti kisi kisi ki hoti hai badi mahan atma hai ji jinhone do din ki chutti milti hai hafte mein koi punya karm kar rakha hota hai.
Executive: Nahi nahi sir aap to businessman hai.
Customer: Samjhe na na badi baat hai hafte mein do din chutti ya to hafte mein ek din bhi chutti nahi hoti pata hi nahi chalta chutti hoti kab hai.
Customer: Wahi baat nahi aap kar rahe hain kar lo ek bar Anil Sharma ji se Anil Kumar ji se baat.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai sir okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Executive was confused about Anil Kumar's number.

- Customer had staffing issues.



Resolution:

- Customer provided Anil Kumar's number.

- Clarified who will handle the training.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- anil kumar, contact, training, staffing
